long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Recordly is the first easy to use voice and screen recording tool. This app enable users to record voice and screen and generate a shareable link with in no time to share your voice with anyone.
Features:
1. Voice Recording
2. Screen Recording
3. 100% secure
4. Lifetime backup of your files
